data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: In the winter my children love to play in the snow. They ____ outside ____ day, making ____ houses ____ eating ____ snow! When ____ are ____ cold, they ____ inside ____ drink ____ hot ____. Snow days are their favorite days.
data.partBlankContent: In the winter my children love to play in the snow. They pl__ outside a__ day, making sn__ houses a__ eating t__ snow! When th__ are t__ cold, they co__ inside a__ drink so__ hot t__. Snow days are their favorite days.
data.fullContent: In the winter my children love to play in the snow. They play outside all day, making snow houses and eating the snow! When they are too cold, they come inside and drink some hot tea. Snow days are their favorite days.
data.answer: 冬天，我的孩子们喜欢在雪里玩。他们整天在外面玩，堆雪屋，吃雪!当他们太冷的时候，他们就会进来喝热茶。下雪天是他们最喜欢的日子。
